pieces

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • pieces.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LineShape, LShape, MLShape, SquareShape, SShape, TShape, ZShape

    public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that is the superclass to all the tetriminos.
    Author:
    Sophey
